summary.content: Web applications developer with more than 5 years of experience working with agile technologies to deliver the best quality products. Diplomatic, kind and expert in handling delicate situations. Highly organized, motivated and competent with the new technologies. Degree in Multimedia.

items.title: GFT Technologies SE
skills: I took part in the implementation of MiFID II in Deutsche Bank.
We used Cobol language (inside the Mainframe platform) as the main programming tool.
I have also earned experience with the language JCL (Job Control Language).
